Guiping county level city in Guigang 貴港|贵港[Gui4 gang3], Guangxi

sentences.english: The landscape, mountains, and lakes in Gui Ping were stunning.
sentences.chinese: 桂平的风景，山水都是极其美好的。

sentences.english: And then this picture is with Mayor Zhang who was kind enough to accompany us on our tour of Gui Ping.
sentences.chinese: 这张是与张市长的合照，他亲切地陪伴我们游览桂平。
